errors.english: she wants to find out what is going to happen
errors.spanish: ella quiere descubrir cuál es va a ocurrir
errors.description: Spanish phrase is malformed. 'cuál es va a ocurrir' is incorrect - it mixes 'cuál es' (what is) with 'va a ocurrir' (going to happen) incorrectly. Should use 'qué va a ocurrir' or restructure entirely.
errors.suggested_fix_english: she wants to find out what is going to happen
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: ella quiere descubrir qué va a ocurrir

errors.english: I want to meet
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is reflexive plural (ourselves), but subject is 'I' (singular). Should be 'reunirme' (to meet myself) or better 'encontrarme/conocer a alguien' depending on context. If meaning 'meet with others', needs object.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet

errors.english: she wants to meet
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' means 'to meet ourselves/us' (plural reflexive), but subject is 'ella' (she). Should be 'reunirse' if intransitive or restructure.
errors.suggested_fix_english: she wants to meet

errors.english: he wants to meet
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is reflexive plural (ourselves), but subject is 'él' (he). Should be 'reunirse'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: he wants to meet

errors.english: I want to meet tomorrow
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'I'. Should be 'reunirme'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet tomorrow

errors.english: she wants to meet with everyone else
errors.spanish: ella quiere reunirnos con todos los demás
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive (to meet ourselves) but subject is 'ella' (she). Should be 'reunirse'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: she wants to meet with everyone else
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: ella quiere reunirse con todos los demás

errors.english: I want to meet and speak Spanish tomorrow
errors.spanish: quiero reunirnos y hablar español mañana
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'I'. Should be 'reunirme'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet and speak Spanish tomorrow
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: quiero reunirme y hablar español mañana

errors.english: I want to meet at six o'clock
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'I'. Should be 'reunirme'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet at six o'clock

errors.english: she wants to meet at six o'clock
errors.spanish: ella quiere reunirnos a las seis
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'ella'. Should be 'reunirse'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: she wants to meet at six o'clock
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: ella quiere reunirse a las seis

errors.english: I want to meet at six o'clock with me
errors.spanish: quiero reunirnos a las seis conmigo
errors.description: Logical error: 'I want to meet with me' doesn't make semantic sense in English. Additionally, 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet at six o'clock

errors.english: she wants to meet at six o'clock with everyone else
errors.spanish: ella quiere reunirnos a las seis con todos los demás
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'ella'. Should be 'reunirse'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: she wants to meet at six o'clock with everyone else
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: ella quiere reunirse a las seis con todos los demás

errors.english: she wants to meet this evening
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'ella'. Should be 'reunirse'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: she wants to meet this evening

errors.english: I want to meet at six o'clock this evening
errors.spanish: quiero reunirnos a las seis esta noche
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'I'. Should be 'reunirme'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet at six o'clock this evening
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: quiero reunirme a las seis esta noche

errors.english: he wants to meet at six o'clock this evening
errors.spanish: él quiere reunirnos a las seis esta noche
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'él'. Should be 'reunirse'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: he wants to meet at six o'clock this evening
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: él quiere reunirse a las seis esta noche

errors.english: I want not
errors.description: In both languages, the word order is incorrect. English should be 'I don't want' or 'I do not want'. Spanish should be 'no quiero' (negation comes before the verb).
errors.suggested_fix_english: I don't want

errors.english: I want not Spanish
errors.description: Incorrect word order in both languages. English should be 'I don't want Spanish'. Spanish should be 'no quiero español'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I don't want Spanish

errors.english: but I want not
errors.description: Incorrect word order. English should be 'but I don't want'. Spanish should be 'pero no quiero'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but I don't want

errors.english: she wants not to come back
errors.description: In English, should be 'she doesn't want to come back'. The Spanish 'ella quiere no volver' is awkward; better as 'ella no quiere volver'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: she doesn't want to come back

errors.english: but I want not Spanish
errors.description: Incorrect word order. English should be 'but I don't want Spanish'. Spanish should be 'pero no quiero español'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but I don't want Spanish

errors.english: but we want not to meet tomorrow
errors.description: Incorrect word order. English should be 'but we don't want to meet tomorrow'. Spanish better as 'pero no queremos reunirnos mañana'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but we don't want to meet tomorrow

errors.english: but he wants not to come back with everyone else
errors.spanish: pero él quiere no volver con todos los demás
errors.description: Incorrect word order. English should be 'but he doesn't want to come back with everyone else'. Spanish better as 'pero él no quiere volver con todos los demás'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but he doesn't want to come back with everyone else
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: pero él no quiere volver con todos los demás

errors.english: I want not
errors.description: Incorrect word order. English should be 'I don't want'. Spanish should be 'no quiero'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I don't want

errors.english: but I want not
errors.description: Incorrect word order. English should be 'but I don't want'. Spanish should be 'pero no quiero'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but I don't want

errors.english: but I want not Spanish
errors.description: Incorrect word order. English should be 'but I don't want Spanish'. Spanish should be 'pero no quiero español'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but I don't want Spanish

errors.english: I want to meet tomorrow
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'I'. Should be 'reunirme'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet tomorrow

errors.english: I want to meet at six o'clock this evening
errors.spanish: quiero reunirnos a las seis esta noche
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'I'. Should be 'reunirme'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet at six o'clock this evening
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: quiero reunirme a las seis esta noche

errors.english: to stop tomorrow
errors.description: 'parar de' requires a verb (infinitive) after it, not a time adverb. 'parar de mañana' is grammatically incorrect. Should be 'parar mañana' (to stop tomorrow) without 'de'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: to stop tomorrow

errors.english: I want not to stop
errors.description: Incorrect word order in English: should be 'I don't want to stop'. Spanish word order also problematic: better as 'no quiero parar de'. Also 'parar de' needs a verb after it.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I don't want to stop

errors.english: he wants to stop tomorrow
errors.description: 'parar de' requires a verb after it, not a time adverb. Should be 'parar mañana'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: he wants to stop tomorrow

errors.english: but I want not to stop
errors.description: Incorrect word order in English: should be 'but I don't want to stop'. Spanish better as 'pero no quiero parar de'. Also 'parar de' needs a verb.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but I don't want to stop

errors.english: she wants to stop with me
errors.description: 'parar de' requires a verb after it. 'parar de conmigo' is incorrect. Should be 'parar conmigo' or restructure entirely.
errors.suggested_fix_english: she wants to stop with me

errors.english: but we want to stop tomorrow
errors.description: 'parar de' requires a verb after it. Should be 'parar mañana'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but we want to stop tomorrow

errors.english: I want to stop at six o'clock
errors.spanish: quiero parar de a las seis
errors.description: 'parar de' requires a verb after it. 'parar de a las seis' is grammatically incorrect. Should be 'parar a las seis'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to stop at six o'clock

errors.english: but I want to stop this evening
errors.spanish: pero quiero parar de esta noche
errors.description: 'parar de' requires a verb after it. Should be 'parar esta noche'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but I want to stop this evening

errors.english: but she wants not to stop with everyone else
errors.spanish: pero ella quiere no parar de con todos los demás
errors.description: Multiple errors: English should be 'but she doesn't want to stop with everyone else'. Spanish should be 'pero ella no quiere parar con todos los demás' ('parar de' needs a verb, not a prepositional phrase).
errors.suggested_fix_english: but she doesn't want to stop with everyone else
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: pero ella no quiere parar con todos los demás

errors.english: I want not to stop talking
errors.description: Incorrect English word order: should be 'I don't want to stop talking'. Spanish is better as 'no quiero parar de hablar'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I don't want to stop talking

errors.english: but I want not to stop talking
errors.spanish: pero quiero no parar de hablar
errors.description: Incorrect English word order: should be 'but I don't want to stop talking'. Spanish is better as 'pero no quiero parar de hablar'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but I don't want to stop talking
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: pero no quiero parar de hablar

errors.english: but you want to meet
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive (ourselves) but subject is 'you' (singular or plural, but doesn't match 'nos'). Should be 'reunirte' for singular you.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but you want to meet

errors.english: and you want to meet at six o'clock
errors.spanish: y quieres reunirnos a las seis
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' doesn't match 'you'. Should be 'reunirte'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: and you want to meet at six o'clock
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: y quieres reunirte a las seis

errors.english: you want to meet with everyone else at six o'clock this evening
errors.spanish: quieres reunirnos con todos los demás a las seis esta noche
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' doesn't match 'you'. Should be 'reunirte'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: you want to meet with everyone else at six o'clock this evening
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: quieres reunirte con todos los demás a las seis esta noche

errors.english: I want name
errors.description: Missing article in both languages. English should be 'I want the name' or 'I want a name'. Spanish should be 'quiero el nombre' or 'quiero un nombre'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want the name

errors.english: to learn name
errors.description: Missing article. English should be 'to learn the name' or 'to learn a name'. Spanish should be 'aprender el nombre' or 'aprender un nombre'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: to learn the name

errors.english: you want name
errors.description: Missing article. English should be 'you want the name' or 'you want a name'. Spanish should be 'quieres el nombre' or 'quieres un nombre'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: you want the name

errors.english: are you learning name
errors.description: Missing article. English should be 'are you learning the name' or 'are you learning a name'. Spanish should be 'estás aprendiendo el nombre' or 'estás aprendiendo un nombre'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: are you learning the name

errors.english: I want to meet tomorrow
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'I'. Should be 'reunirme'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet tomorrow

errors.english: but because I want to meet at six o'clock
errors.spanish: pero porque quiero reunirnos a las seis
errors.description: Subject-verb mismatch: 'reunirnos' is plural reflexive but subject is 'I'. Should be 'reunirme'.
errors.suggested_fix_english: but because I want to meet at six o'clock
errors.suggested_fix_spanish: pero porque quiero reunirme a las seis

errors.english: I want to meet with me
errors.description: Logical error: 'I want to meet with me' doesn't make semantic sense in English. Spanish 'encontrar conmigo' is also illogical.
errors.suggested_fix_english: I want to meet someone

errors.english: Spanish people
errors.description: Adjective agreement error in Spanish. 'español' should agree with 'personas' (feminine plural), so it should be 'personas españolas'. However, if meaning 'people (who speak) Spanish', it's semantically awkward without context.
errors.suggested_fix_english: Spanish people
